comment: /**  * Starts the web monitor.  *  * @throws Exception This method may forward exceptions, if it cannot bring up the web monitor.  */
code: /**  * Starts the web monitor.  *  * @throws Exception This method may forward exceptions, if it cannot bring up the web monitor.  */ void start() throws Exception.

comment: /**  * Stops the web server.  *  * @throws Exception This method may forward exceptions, if it cannot properly stop the web monitor.  */
code: /**  * Stops the web server.  *  * @throws Exception This method may forward exceptions, if it cannot properly stop the web monitor.  */ void stop() throws Exception.

comment: /**  * Gets the port that the web server actually binds to. If port 0 was given in  * the configuration, then a random free port will be picked. This method can  * be used to determine this port.  *  * @return The port where the web server is listening, or -1, if no server is running.  */
code: /**  * Gets the port that the web server actually binds to. If port 0 was given in  * the configuration, then a random free port will be picked. This method can  * be used to determine this port.  *  * @return The port where the web server is listening, or -1, if no server is running.  */ int getServerPort().

comment: /**  * Returns the REST address of this WebMonitor.  *  * @return REST address of this WebMonitor  */
code: /**  * Returns the REST address of this WebMonitor.  *  * @return REST address of this WebMonitor  */ String getRestAddress().
